parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Data sudah masuk dan update ke database",
  "recordCount": {{ $json.recordCount }},
  "platform": "{{ $json.platform }}",
  "brand": "{{ $json.brand }}",
  "branch": "{{ $json.branch }}",
  "dataType": "{{ $json.dataType }}",
  "timestamp": "{{ $now.toISO() }}"
}
